byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: There is little MF Global and Netflix have in common, except for the fact that the stocks of both companies plunged on Tuesday after a spate of bad news.
snippet: There is little MF Global and Netflix have in common, except for the fact that the stocks of both companies plunged on Tuesday after a spate of bad news.

headline.main: The Biggest Losers: MF Global and Netflix
